channel.title: SMF Question -- Stars and Badges
channel.description:
Okay, so I recently added the Stars and Badges mod to my SMF forums. Now, I need to know how to add the images i want.
I posted this here because it's PHP.
Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: SMF Question -- Stars and Badges
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

m.dog311:

If its on localhost just drag the image into Themes\SomeTheme\images. When you get a webserver you will have to use an FTP client to access your site files, and upload it that way.

Oh wow, I’m retarded. I searched the Themes for like 20 minutes and didn’t see anything…

Okay, well now, how do I make it so where it still has the stars, but then also has the badge?

Figured it out, you make it the avatar

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Question -- Stars and Badges
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:354235”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=450529.msg3304745#msg3304745 date=1281577552]

Upload image like you normally would, put members into multiple membergroups, profit???

I need to know how to upload images, cuz i fail
[/quote]Are you hosting the webserver?[/quote]

Right now its on localhost, but I plan to host the webserver myself, yes.

Read full topic
